net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.strategy

Interface EvaluationStrategy<U,I>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStrategy, AllItems, RelPlusN, TestItems, TrainItems, UserTest

    public interface EvaluationStrategy<U,I>
    An interface for evaluation strategies.
    Author:
    Alejandro

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  EvaluationStrategy.OUTPUT_FORMAT
      Enumeration that defines two output formats: a simple one (tab-separated) and another compatible with the one used by the treceval program.
      static class  EvaluationStrategy.Pair<A,B>
      Bean class to store an element of type A and another of type B
